get.description: List files and directories in the specified path

parameters.name: path

parameters.description: File or directory path to delete

Upload multiple files with their destination paths

get.description: Get detailed information about a file or directory

post.description: Move or rename a file or directory from source to destination
Set file permissions for a file or directory. On Windows, only mode changes are supported (owner/group are ignored).
Replace text pattern with new value in multiple files

parameters.description: Destination path for the uploaded file

files.description: files to add (use . for all files)
